verses.name: Psalms 98:5
verses.text: Sing unto the Lord with the harp; with the harp, and the voice of a psalm.

verses.name: Psalms 98:6
verses.text: With trumpets and sound of cornet make a joyful noise before the Lord, the King.

verses.name: Psalms 98:7
verses.text: Let the sea roar, and the fulness thereof; the world, and they that dwell therein.

verses.name: Psalms 98:8
verses.text: Let the floods clap their hands: let the hills be joyful together

verses.name: Psalms 98:9
verses.text: Before the Lord; for he cometh to judge the earth: with righteousness shall he judge the world, and the people with equity.
